required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sublingual vs Vaginal Misoprostol for Termination of First Trimesteric Missed Abortion
clinical_study.official_title: Sublingual vs Vaginal Misoprostol for Termination of First Trimesteric Missed Abortion

brief_summary.textblock: Efficacy of sublingual versus vaginal misoprostol in termination of first trimester missed abortion

detailed_description.textblock: study will be made on female patients with first trimester missed abortion confirmed by ultrasound . Participants will be divided into 2 groups one group (A) will receive sublingual Misoprostol and the other group(B) will receive vaginal Misoprostol as a 800 micro grams every 4 hours in both groups up to five doses the aim of the study is to compare efficay of sublingual and vaginal Misoprostol in complete termination of first trimester missed abortion and which route is the best will less side effects.

primary_outcome.measure: The occurance of complete abortion within 24 hours with Misoprostol drug
primary_outcome.description: Efficacy of sublingual and vaginal Misoprostol in complete termination of first trimester missed abortion

primary_outcome.measure: Which route is the best and less side effects in complete termination of first trimester missed abortion by Misoprostol drug
primary_outcome.description: Vaginal versus sublingual route of administration of Misoprostol for complete termination of first trimester missed abortion

arm_group.arm_group_label: Sublingual Misoprostol for termination of first trimester missed abortion
arm_group.description: Patients diagnosed as first trimester missed abortion will receive sublingual Misoprostol 800 micrograms every 4 hours up to five doses

arm_group.arm_group_label: Vaginal Misoprostol for termination of first trimester missed abortion
arm_group.description: Patients diagnosed as first trimester missed abortion will receive vaginal Misoprostol 800 micrograms every 4 hours up to five doses

intervention.description: sublingual versus vaginal Misoprostol in termination of first trimester missed abortion
intervention.arm_group_label: Sublingual Misoprostol for termination of first trimester missed abortion
Vaginal Misoprostol for termination of first trimester missed abortion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women with an ultrasound diagnosis of missed abortion < 13 weeks gestation without any clinical criteria of Inevitable abortion.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients refused the medical treatment.
- Patients have contraindications of the drug (Misoprostol).
- Missed abortion associated with any signs of sepsis

reference.citation: Allameh Z, Goharian M, Eslamian M. Effect of misoprostol with and without letrozole on the induction of abortion for women with first-trimester missed abortion. Int J Gynaecol Obstet. 2020 Nov;151(2):214-218. doi: 10.1002/ijgo.13326. Epub 2020 Sep 1.
Tang OS, Gemzell-Danielsson K, Ho PC. Misoprostol: pharmacokinetic profiles, effects on the uterus and side-effects. Int J Gynaecol Obstet. 2007 Dec;99 Suppl 2:S160-7. Epub 2007 Oct 26. Review.
